title: Executive Order 5927-Power-Site Restoration No. 475, California
content: So much of the order of February 25, 1919, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 706, as affects the lands hereinafter described is hereby revoked:
T. 2 N., R. 16 E., sec. 16, SW. ¼ NE. ¼, W. ½ NE. ¼ SW. ¼, SE. ¼ NE. ¼ SW. ¼.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5927-Power-Site Restoration No. 475, California Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361504
